response.overview: Drs. Jack and Rexella Van Impe give you the biblical insight and wisdom you need in order to read the truth contained in today's news - which is filled with Bible prophecy and signs of the coming latter days! In this video teaching, get immediate answers to intriguing questions such as: Is the one-world government almost here? Will it produce a global ID system? Does that technology exist today? Will a global dictator and religious leader demand that this ID mark be taken - perhaps in the very near future? Is Brussels, Belgium, the home to TWO sinister organizations with a role to play in latter days prophecy? You and your family and your unsaved loved ones need to know the truth, and you can find it here!
response.tagline: Understand the headlines in light of PROPHECY
response.title: Global ID: 666
